double_crochet will be in the last stitch 7 cdc double_crochet in between double_crochet pair 4x 2dc between next double_crochet pair 2x single_crochet in next 3ch space 10x 2dc between next the first bpdc i did a single chain repeat row 9 to 12 finish on a row you like the look
